name: Baseball Mogul 2017
description: The groundbreaking franchise that revolutionized sports games continues to redefine the way you run and manage your favorite baseball team. This year's version includes more than 100 updates and new features.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 512 MB available space Additional Notes: Not a demanding game on GPU or CPU. Basic or old computers will run this just fine.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 2 GB available space
